website_summaries.verdict: Complete dog-washing system that includes handheld shower sprayer and is designed to attach to your own bathroom shower.
pros: Good water pressure – no leakage when turned off or not in use
Easy to install and water comes out smooth
cons: Will need plumber's tape to attach sprayer to shower head as well as a drill to attach holder to inside shower walls or tiles

customer_reviews.title: Finally: A solid diverter valve
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dog shower that isn't a plastic piece of junk. This is totally worth the extra money in my book because you don't have to monkey around with leaks and cracked parts because the diverter is metal and that's generally the first to crack in my long experience with plastic diverter valves for my dog's shower. The only criticism I have (and it's not a big deal) is that if you're attaching to a single lever faucet, it's difficult to regulate the flow. It works like a kitchen faucet sprayer and it's hard to get a lower volume spray for the dog's face area (for example).
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great attachment, works really well. It doesn't come with a shower head so will need to plan accordingly. The long hose is great and the water pressure will get the job done. I wish it were possible to somehow get the converter closer to the handle but it's fine that it is up by the shower head. Overall very pleased with the product and would highly recommend it for someone looking for a dog washing shower head or for rinsing cloth diapers- because of the long hose it reaches to my toilet just fine!
customer_reviews.author: ProlificMDreader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this kit. They provide a brass valve assembly, not the usual cheap plastic crap. The instructions were clear and easy to follow making the installation a breeze. They even provide a small roll of Teflon tape! It has a strong spray pattern to reach my lab’s undercoat and get the soap off.
customer_reviews.author: Linuxian

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works on a German Shepard's thick coat.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Easy to install and the water spray is super strong. We have 3 dogs and one is a German shepherd. He is impossible to wash with his thick coat. This did the trick after trying a few other products. Based on other reviews I used a rubber band on the handle to give it a grip since it was commented to be very slippery. Will look into something more permanent but rubber band works fine for now. Nice solid build and not lightweight plastic. Includes everything needed, even the thread tape, for install. Just need a screwdriver and a drill bit if you use included drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly girl

customer_reviews.title: Not good product
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible product ! I keep holding myself to write the review but after getting all my bathroom wet I decided to finally go for it. There is no way to adjust the power of the water on that thing. It splashes all over the place. My dog is also terrified of it because of it’s power. I am very disappointed and also you can get it for $10 through wish app . So it is very unfair price as well
customer_reviews.author: knife in the water

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Attachment to wash your dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because we've had a long winter here in San Diego with lots of rain. The Pups haven't had baths on their usual schedule. They stink. I could go to the local dog wash but both my dogs are highly reactive and it's never a good experience. So I ordered this attachment. Came with everything needed to install..A huge plus!!. We have a 100 year old house so my Husband was nervous about the install. It took 5 minutes. Initially there was a little leaking but more plumbers tap and it stopped. Has VERY high pressure which is nice. Works great both dogs got nice warm baths. I would definately recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: A very helpful device to help wash our Beagle
customer_reviews.text: We have been considering some sort of spray device that we could use to wash and rinse off while bathing our dog. There had not seemed a good way to do this. However, finding this shower sprayer was great in that it was made of very quality materials, came with everything needed for installation, and with the length of the hose, it could be hung away from the tub, but with sufficient length to cover our needs. It was easy to install...just remove the shower head and hook the unit into the line. I would recommend this device very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wells

customer_reviews.title: Leaky product
customer_reviews.text: I installed this & even with plumbing tape, it leaks & sprays water from all hose connections. I have had this over a month before I installed today so I missed out on the return time period. This is a waste & save yourself the time OR install the same day so you can return it if it does the same that happened to me. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: We'd been showering our 143 pound Staffordshire and 85 pound American bull dog in our regular shower mostly by filling up a large cup and dumping it on them. My husband installed this in a few minutes and both of our dogs were cleaner than they'd ever been in less time than it usually took to shower one of them. It made getting their armpits and bellies a piece of cake! The ability to control the pressure is easy and a great feature. It doesn't leak at all when not switched on. I think they actually enjoyed their showers because the pressure is like a massage. My only regret is not buying this sooner! Very much worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 10 dog showers
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic diverter handle broke off after 10 dog showers. Avoid. Edit: REEGE replaced the diverter handle, and this one operates much more smoothly after reading my review. Good job REEGE, I didn't even have to contact support. I'll leave you at 4 stars unless it breaks again. Other than the diverter handle, the dog shower is awesome. If you have been leaning over the tub killing your back while bathing your dogs, this is for you. SO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! Post beach sand removal & Cloth Diaper Cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm for our outdoor shower and the sprayer is so great after a trip back from the beach with young kids and getting sand out of all their little bits and crevices!! This has been so helpful and couldn’t do my cloth diapering without the sprayer! It was a great option to do without a bidet attached to toilet as we were afraid our young kids would go playing in the restroom spraying it! Love this and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the best investment I think I've ever made. It took only 5-10 minutes to wash, AND REPEAT, my 65-75 lb pit/boxer. It has fairly good pressure to actually penetrate his coarse, silky coat. Normally water would just run right off of him. When using the soap dispenser, you can really tell it's working!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love how the water shoots out fast enough and with enough force to really get the dogs clean fast. I've never seen so much hair and dirt come off of them! (they love rolling in the yard). It's been a week now and the oily dog I have isn't gross yet! I believe it's because I was able to get him thoroughly clean. I like to use this as a waterpick in the shower as well as a bidet type spray to get super clean in the shower. Chrome hardware and minimalist design, it's small and easy to use. Functionally, the super long hose is a must to get dog's underside. Multipurpose. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes of using this unit as a dog washer and bidet. The tub shower is right next to the toilet so it would have been a perfect set up. The unit is a very nice looking and well made. I installed the unit but it leaked at the diverter valve. The shower connection, the shower head connection and hose connection were not a problem but how do you fix a problem with the diverter? The hose was the best part of this unit and I thought about keeping it just for the hose. Really nice and flexible, drapes beautifully and is extra long.
customer_reviews.author: thumzup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and works beautifully for what I needed, which was mostly an extension with good water pressure to bathe the dog. both showerhead and sprayer work great, no leaks, easy switch between the two options ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No mention that the holder for sprayer attachment has to be screwed in so if you have a tile shower then makes it a bit more difficult. and the screws they provide are no longer long enough if they have to go through tile. Also why on Earth do they not provide you with a gasket for the back of the holder for the sprayer attachment. Seems like that would be first thought in a wet area. Really feels like this should of cost 15$ instead of 40$. Definitely don't feel like it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: theadore scaggs

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer is solid but don't plan on the wall mount lasting.
customer_reviews.text: If the wall mount portion of this sprayer was more sturdy this thing would get a 5-star rating. The mounting hardware included *should* secure it safely to any wall; even drywall. The screws are a bit too short and the fact that the handle slips into the cradle WAY TO TIGHT result in force being needed to remove it from the cradle. We are not using the cradle now because it will rip out of the drywall and make a big hole to patch if we do. I'll need to find another way to mount this which is not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JetCityPD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, easy to install, no flow restrictor, works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could more easily wash my 50 lb dog in the shower. I found this sprayer to be high quality and super easy to install (it even comes with a roll of teflon tape). There seems to be no flow restrictor in the sprayer head, so the water spray is quite powerful. The hose is the perfect length and is very flexible, not stiff. I could not install the holder as one must use screws to install it and my shower has only tile. The sprayer hangs nicely on the inside handle of the the shower door, so this really isn't a problem for me. I would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: It's still going strong a year later. The pressure is super intense but can be adjusted by turning the top valve back a little. It works really well to get all the way down past the fluff of double coats so you can give them a thorough bath AND rinse it all away. I have a GSD and a Rottweiler that I use this on in the colder months. Side note, WOW apple cider vinegar shampoo works really well on getting dandruff out of their fur and keeping their scalp/skin healthy. Plus, they smell terrific!
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Red Mud Coated Poodles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wonderful product on March 31. We just moved into a new construction house and the grass in the backyard was mostly red Alabama dirt. Both of our standard poodles loved being in the large backyard and would bring most of it in the house. Our groomer had stopped taking clients and I was forced to bath them in our extra large tub with a big pitcher. We order this shower and my handy husband installed it and my life has almost returned to norma,l concerning the dogs. If you bath your children, dogs, etc. save your back and buy this great shower nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quailty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprayer. No leaks, beautiful finish. It will not work with older Waterpix shower sprayers with the flex hose you will need to buy and extension. I only wish my shower head was as strong as this sprayer. It is great for washing the dogs, the hose is plenty long. I love it for rinsing the shower after cleaning. The only complaint is that the sprayer is hard to hold with soapy hands. I am still working on what to do about that. I was thinking the glue down shower floor anti-slip strips might work. I just can't find them for sale.
customer_reviews.author: OAH

customer_reviews.title: Dog Shower Spayer
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for something like this for washing the dogs. I been using small bucket scoop to wash and rinse the dogs but glad this will make life easier when washing the hounds. The installation was easy to install and the hose was long enough to reach out when needed. I like the rainfall features for the dogs, Overall happy and satisfied with this purchased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ha

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this dog shower hose was much better than many others I've bought (obviously, or I wouldn't have to be buying another one). The stream is strong and variable. The only thing I'd say is that if you need to vary the stream pressure a lot while washing your dog, your hand can get a little sore, as the handle isn't quite as ergonomic as it could be, but overall it's a great shower hose. Very happy with it. It looks nice in our master shower and feels like it will be around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: snipeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Flow knob broke after a months use.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month. The arm to toggle the flow of water broke today. Does anyone know if I have to get a whole new set or if there is some kind of replacement part?
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: With all the rain we have had in Western NC this past year, my yard is a bloody mess. Almost everyday after work I find my dog Caked with mud. No problem anymore! I take her in the shower and use this AWESOME dog spray. No leaks, good pressure. Its gets the mud off fast. What is really nice is that I don't need to use any shampoo or conditioner. Its not good to use shampoo all the time on a dog. Can wreck havoc on their skin. This is the best alternative. Just spray them down and dry them. OH, and plenty of house.!
customer_reviews.author: Samhein

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is working out quite well. I don't use my shower head, so my son took of the shower head and connected it directly to the pipe. My only concern before it arrive is that the hose would not be long enough, since my shower is set really high, but it worked out that just fine. My dogs are enjoying the spay and it is making bathing them much easier. I think most will be happy with this spray attachment.
customer_reviews.author: CherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful...but powerful spray.
customer_reviews.text: I love this attachment for washing my kids hair as well as my dog. The only issue I had is that the power of the spray was just crazy strong. I had to buy an attachment that allows me to control the water flow so it's not so hard on my children's head or my dogs body.
customer_reviews.author: *the*littlest*star*

customer_reviews.title: Slippery!!
customer_reviews.text: When wet, the nozzle becomes slippery and difficult to hang onto. We even applied that rubber grip stuff used on tools, and it's still slippery! Also, after only a couple of uses, the water no longer came out as a spray. The "spray" is now all concentrated to the middle, so it's a very powerful (depending on water setting) single stream of water. Waste of money in my opinion! Need to redesign where the nozzle can be held in your palm and on/off lever controlled by a thumb.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Washer for Pets!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and looked like a winner-----until it was installed and the water turned on. The boost in water pressure is guaranteed to skin your pet in just a few seconds!!!! I could not hold my hand in front of the nozzle because the pressure was intense. We ended up taking the face of the sprayer off and using it like a regular hose to wash our Aussie. I thought about it for awhile afterwards and decided to use my drill to enlarge the holes in the face of the sprayer. I easily drilled half of the existing holes about twice the original size and now this is the PERFECT product to wash my dog! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $40
customer_reviews.text: Did not read description completely. Overlooked the fact that I had to drill 2 more holes into the wall. None the less, decided to go ahead and install it. Since I paid $40 I expected this to last and be worth the mounting. First use, the converter piece was leaking water down the shower head and hose. The sprayer pressure is not adjustable and way too strong to spray my dogs. So now I have 2 holes in my wall and a handheld sprayer that is not actually serving any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aliegha Driver

customer_reviews.title: Very good but could be even better ..
customer_reviews.text: I like this sprayer except for one thing: it doesn't have the ability to stay on without having to continually hold down the trigger. I find when bathing my dog that my fingers get slippery from the soap and it's hard to keep the trigger pressed when rinsing him (esp. his belly). The sprayer would be perfect if a hard press locked the handle/trigger in place. Another press could release it to stop the flow of water. If it had this feature I'd give it the full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful spray.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The only thing I wish it had is a flow controller. It only has 1 speed and it's wide open. If you don't have the ability to control flow with your faucet handles (which I don't. I have the single handle that controls temperature and flow.) then it's a pretty strong blast. Too strong to wash all areas of a dog, but great for heavy fur areas. A flow control valve would make this perfect, but it's good just how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in IL

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works well.
customer_reviews.text: It works and works well. No leaking. Got it for my dog, of course. There's a slight learning curve to learn how much pressure to apply to have a slight to moderate force of water sprayed in the dog, but it's not hard to learn. This shower sprayer is solid, well made with metal parts, and therefore more expensive than other models. Penny wise and pound foolish if something cheaper is chosen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Had a rubber one that didn’t fit over the tub spout well and would blow off. This one is plumbed in and works great. Cuts my 2 dogs bathing time in half.
customer_reviews.author: pamela wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It sprays too hard. There's no adjustment for how hard it sprays. Had to buy a piece to be able to hang from shower head or would have to drill into tile. No one uses it and the dog does not like it. We will buy an adjustable part for sprayer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shower attachment.
customer_reviews.text: We wash our dogs in our shower that has a big rain like shower head. The hose is long enough that it connects above the head and has more than plenty of hose available to reach the dogs a couple times over. My wife and I are fairly tall so we can reach the on/off valve easily. Very good investment. The only thing it needs is a hook or something to attach to the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Makes Dog Bath a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the water pressure in this sprayer but I have to say it is great. Our shower head is very high up on our wall and this hose is long enough to reach all the way to the other end of the tub which is where my doggie's rear end is. It was super easy to install and everything fit as hoped. No leaking, very easy to operate. This has made giving my dogs baths a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Worked WAY better than plastic pet bath versions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Conair dog shower type deal similar to this. It was absolutely terrible. Hooked it up one time and it leaked in three different places constantly. So I found this, bought it yesterday and hooked it up today. I just gave my dog a bath/shower in my apartment bathtub with this thing and it worked PERFECTLY. Awesome product so far. As long as it stays working perfectly and doesn’t leak everywhere it will be an amazing product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Compton

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This dog sprayer set is awesome! It is high quality, works great (don't turn water on high or it will spray too hard), included the diverter which is easy to use and made of metal with real chrome, not plastic, it included washers to keep it from leaking as well as teflon tape for the pipe threads, and was packaged very well in a box with foam cut out to hold the part in place. Makes bathing my dogs so easy! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J's Mom

customer_reviews.title: easy to install. looks good.
customer_reviews.text: this sprayer is really nice. easy to install. only down side might be that there is no spray adjustment for a softer or harder spray on the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: However, I wish it had an adjustable spray on the head. In my situation, the shower selector is a lever that turns from off to cold to hot. No pressure adjustment so while the pressure is fine for the shower head when you switch to the hand held unit the pressure is rather strong since the spray holes are small and fewer than the shower head. I'm sure it's great for standard showers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Puppy/Dog Bath
customer_reviews.text: I have a three month old puppy and even though it's a girl, she wasn't keen on the idea of a bath. I had something similar but without the ease of this one that I gave my other dog a bath with. I honestly can't say anything against the product, I like the sprays (just strong enough), I love the pause feature (my old one did not have it) and I think it is strongly made which will last us through alot of baths. My puppy likes it because it gets the job done fast and she can be dried off and playing sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Scheier

customer_reviews.title: Works! One cosmetic gripe though.
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. One thing is the screw on to the shower pipe is not prefect. When I tighten the connector, it sticks out sideways rather than downward like in your picture. It works, but it does look a little ugly and I could see a situation where the connector sticks out upward if it happens to screw on tight at that position.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the walls frequently
customer_reviews.text: Moving the spray head forward turns it on very sensitive moving it backwards it sprays you , dumb design a push button would have been much easier , the shampoo in the back of the shower head dispenses always so you can't rinse..Again really terrible design Stay away!!!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed to wash our dogs in the tub. Our dog salon is closed because of the coronavirus and dog washing was unavailable. I read the reviews for this product and decided to order. I'm so glad I did. It was an extremely easy installation and the the quality was fantastic! One of my best Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: pillyforpumas

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bathroom in my basement. I do my clients hair and this is perfect for my needs. I had to purchase a separate holder because I have horrible studs in my walls and my drill was not getting through them studs. I don't have any leaks and I was happy it came with a little roll of tape. Amazing product. Happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Nisey

customer_reviews.title: Good overall product
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really good sprayer, however I decided not to keep it because the lever did not offer much modulation of the flow of water. It is pretty much on or off. I really prefer this lever style sprayer over the one I ended up keeping, but my desire to be able to modulate the flow was more important. Definitely recommend this if having modulation is not important to you, though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Clinesmith

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Bidet, Great for cleaning tub
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, easy to adjust spray and because of hose length turns it into a bidet. Turn the pressure up and use it on tuff to clean items. I don't have a pet so I think their marketing is a little off, it's more of a universal cleaning devise. Very easy to install, less than 5 min.. If they want to improve it they could make the hose attachment piece with a spray handle holder, so you would not have to drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was able to bath our dogs easily with the nearly 8 ft hose. The spray handle is extremely heavy & durable. The only negative was the part that needs to be attached to tile to hold the hose & handle. It would have been nice to a have a tile drill bit included or some other way to secure the holder to the shower.
customer_reviews.author: JC CityofOAK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install, just followed the directions. You may need a wrench or pipe wrench to remove your existing shower head, but that's all. I haven't used it other than to see if it worked without any leaks. Hoping it will work well for my dog and guests who wish to use it. I like that it has a long hose which will be helpful in bathing.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have a golden retriever and it was always hard to get his under coat wet and rinsed with the previous dog sprayer I had. This one makes it so much easier to get him wet and rinsed off! The only thing I dont like is that the holder for the sprayer has to be attached some where with screws and I dont want to drill into my tub surround.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFlower

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This works. It’s not particularly attractive and it leaks sometimes where it is connected. There’s nowhere to mount the holder in my bathroom so I just have it hanging...so that’s inconvenient. The water pressure is a little too much for my little dogs...not sure why, we normally have disappointingly low water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and/or Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to hook
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to hook, water runs strong and it makes the bathing of our furry kiddos easier. I wish I had gotten this one earlier and stop paying so much money out there in the grooming places. Very happy with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Works AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is really awesome. We attached it to our shower head, and it has this great switch to change the water from the shower head to the sprayer - but it's like a sink sprayer so unless you are holding down the sprayer, or have it on continuous spray, there's no water - which is PERFECT when you're soaping up the pup and not wanting water spraying everywhere. Super easy to use, great water pressure, and made giving my dogs baths SO MUCH EASIER. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflowersandanarchy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t look any further. I love this thing. I installed it on my own and it was so super simple. (I’m not handy at all so it was a huge accomplishment.) easy to use instructions, comes with everything you need, and works amazing. We got it for the dogs but we use it for ourselves and cleaning the tub as well. Only negative is the holder that comes with it is meant to be screwed into the wall but with our standard shows, we’d have to drill through the plastic. We would have preferred a suction option.
customer_reviews.author: Nagem

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the hose and sprayer. I love how strong the water current is (we have a large dog with thick fur and it's exactly what we need to penetrate that fur). I love the length of the hose. I love that it took me about five minutes to unscrew our shower head, add the attachment, replace the shower head and begin using it! It is incredibly worth the money ... and the cost was low! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HollyU

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: The holder does not stay on the wall of our shower no matter what we do, and for the few seconds it does stay the handheld does not even seem to fit securely enough to stay anyways. When using it the water pressure is good, we use this to give the dogs a bath or to rinse shampoo out of our kids hair during bath time and it works well for those purposes, just sucks that it would stay on the wall to hang/store.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: Spray is to hard, can’t use it on my dog. Sprayer in picture and when you get it looks like something on your sink but the spray is to direct it’s too hard to try to use on an animal it would hurt them or scare them and you’ll never get a chance to be them again
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't particularly like bath time and has a thick, wirey coat with undercoat. It used to be challenging to wash him without getting water everywhere. This trigger sprayer makes it possible to focus on scrubbing and keeping the dog in the shower without water spraying everywhere. It focuses the water into a powerful stream that can penetrate even a tick coat to rinse all the soap out efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog baths in a jiffy
customer_reviews.text: I have a little tike and at first when I pushed the trigger all the way down it sent my dog skidding across the bathtub lol has nice power for bigger dogs and I feel like it really gets down to the roots to remove dirt and get all the soap out. Easy to install and use. Just don’t squeeze the trigger all the down if you have a tiny 4lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to shower head
customer_reviews.text: We use this sprayer to wash our 85lb Doberman in the bathtub in our home. We previously had a plastic one that I fought until it finally broke. This one is so much better as it stays in place with a toggle to switch between shower head and sprayer. It is very sturdy medal and perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit with limit plastic parts. The sprayer, deverter valve and flex tube are all metal, but the holder that mounts to the tub surround is plastic. I would have given this unit 5 STARS except for the threads did not align the deverter valve in the correct position and the hose connection in the vertical position upward. I tried a heavy wrap of Teflon tape to take up some of the slack and finally applied pipe dope to resolve the issue kind of. I've had it for 30days and used it twice since installation. The unit worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was pretty straight forward for install and use. The line for the sprayer is long enough to be used effectively and the sprayer has a tight pattern with plenty of pressure. I have bought similar style units in the past that did not work out. So far I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stream!  Parts need constant replacing.
customer_reviews.text: I have paid at least $100 for this $40 hose in less than a year replacing parts that break or leak constantly. Why? Because when this thing works, it works better than any hose we have had. Too bad the workmanship is total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Dog wash!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Needs some Teflon tape to limit leakage but this is PERFECT for my walk in shower to bathe my dogs. We moved and left our old European showerhead behind and love the fixed one in our new shower but no way to wash the dogs. VOILA!
customer_reviews.author: WINTERFARM

customer_reviews.title: quality feel of the spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: i like the feel of the head sprayer feels expensive and the spray slider well build. i am happy with this sprayer i don;t use it for dogs i use it to clean my feet and bathtub. i did not like the first time i install it it was leaking a bit , but now no more leaks. i would recommend this sprayer i use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Much needed! Stupid TP crisis!
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely more expensive than buying the parts at the local hardware store, but so worth it right now. The design is set to technically allow for a softer term start, but it really depends on how careful you are when pressing the trigger, and how much water pressure you have. That said. I’m so glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: The Lady Gee

customer_reviews.title: Spray stream is too strong and non-adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This spray head only provides one flow rate which is very concentrated and "hard". It is difficult to lessen the stream by easing up on the handle. It's mostly an all on or all off deal. Also the water tends to get very hot in the tube while releasing the handle to use both hands on the dog. When I did a search this was the only one that showed up so I bought it. Now knowing that there are many others on the market with adjustable spray options I will be purchasing one of those to replace this unit
customer_reviews.author: Ira Idelson

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Works well. Saves water in a shower.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has plenty of pressure. Very happy with it. My only suggestion is that as I use it in a tiled floor shower (saves water since it turns off when not in use) that it have rubber cushions of some kind on the drop points to keep it from cracking a tile if it slips out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The Reege was exactly as described and works great. The hose is nice and long and I love that it is so flexible, it was easy to install. The pressure control works great for us whether for spraying a dog, filling a bucket or cleaning a messy crate. I had originally bought a regular hand held shower from another store but the Reege dog shower sprayer works much better.
customer_reviews.author: CELESTE L.

customer_reviews.title: A horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Water sprays too strong that it goes all over the place and there is no mechanism to control it. It's extremely slippery when you have soap on your hand. For this product I could never understand why it has such a high rating, I bought it because of that reason. Wasted time on installing and uninstalling it. Now I have to find a way to cover 2 drilled holes on my shower room, I should have tested this product before drilling the holes. I drilled first because of the confidence from the high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Link Le

customer_reviews.title: The best hookup
customer_reviews.text: Okay I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! We don’t have a bathtub downstairs that allows a hose in it so it took literally a few minutes to get it hooked up and it was amazing. I have two Goldens that need to bathed regularly due to playing outside. This works great!!! Almost tempted to buy another for a spare, just in case. Buy it you’ll be so happy you did, I AM!!! Super product thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C Palmer

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but decent
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product, the sprayer is plastic, it does not include a shower head, you cannot use the shower and the sprayer at the same time. You can swap out the valve for a chrome T for about 11 bucks, so you can use both at the same time, or find a 3-way diverter so youcan keep the functions going, but also operate them at the same time, you can probably sources for $10 cheaper but you have to spend your time looking up stuff and know what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron berger

customer_reviews.title: Strong spray
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sprayer but with one complaint - the spray is a bit too strong. I wish there was some way to regulate the strength of the spray or that the continual spray wasn't so hard. I have to be really careful with my small dogs and the hard spray. It did make it easier to give my pups their bath instead of using a cup to wet them down and rinse them.
customer_reviews.author: Gilli

customer_reviews.title: Cut bath time in half!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong spray but my shy dogs didn't seem to mind. It actually cut bath time in half because to gets the dogs wet fast and rinses the shampoo out fast. The hose is super long and really well made. Very solid. And you can get the water to spray continuously if you flip the handle up.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We groom our dogs at home. This is powerful and doesn’t take forever to rinse them! The only design flaw I see is it’s hard to hold the handle when your hands are soaped up. A rubber coated handle would have made this perfect. But regardless, it’s still worth it! Bath time was a lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: Must have for big dog owners.
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must have for the big dog owner. Can’t believe that we went without it for so long. Works amazing and is worth every penny. Also work great to rinse shower and tub after cleaning. Only negative I can give this product is the nozzle holder mounts with screws only wish it came with double side tape option. Not a deal breaker we just hang the nozzle from the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Tifanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Expeditiously shipped, well packed and designed sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping timeline was excellent, the product well protected during transit. The vendor got everything right to compliment this thoughtfully designed sprayer. Will use this to spray plants rather than pets, but the Reege design's ideal for many practical uses. The sprayer's force is well suited to many shower-stall cleaning tasks. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Tile guyinstalled it. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Fire hose force. Steam rises. use as a bidet if you dare. Wash my dog? Uh, she’s too delicate. I’ll use the shower head for Her.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne lowrie

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to wash the dog if he doesn't fit in the kitchen sink or if that grosses you out. The sprayer installed easily and works great without any leaking. It's nice to toggle between regular shower and the sprayer hose. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B. T.

customer_reviews.title: SO useful. Took a few minutes to connect but in ...
customer_reviews.text: SO useful. Took a few minutes to connect but in the end aligned perfectly, no leaks, perfect length, very nice finish that complements any chrome fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product, High Quality, Beautiful Chrome Finish, Well made, Nice machined threads and a smooth operating valve. The spray head is of excellent quality as well, The hose is well made smooth and flexible I highly recommend this product. This is the mark of Excellence at a very low cost... WOW !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is wonderful for dog baths. I have two large dogs and they are hard to get rinsed and have dander problems. I turned the sprayer on and it had such power it worked up the dander on its own and even moved the hair away, recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: ajb5456

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in nozzle control.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my bath tub to use for my Dogs. Sprayer is extremely powerful, way to hard to rinse my dogs, can not control water flow with actuator. When hands r wet impossible to hold. Need nozzle with better control and water is not like a jet. Very disappointed in function. Quality of unit us very high.
customer_reviews.author: B Dent

customer_reviews.title: Good value and well built
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a quality piece, and has a long hose (longer than I realized or needed). The brass valve is nice, and moves easily and seems like it will last a long time. I installed it with no leaks on the first try thanks to the teflon tape they provide. It has a very strong spray like others have said but you can vary it by pulling the trigger less.
customer_reviews.author: RC_Foam_Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to bathe our shihtzu dogs that have gotten too big for the sink. Install was easy and seems well made. If the spray seems too hard then lower the water pressure at the faucett. I like the stronger spray since I can rinse out the shampoo easier. The handle is slick in the hand but you can buy vinyl coating in paint stores that add a rough feel to the handle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stream
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for several months to shower my dogs. I like that I can rinse them very well. The stream is a little more powerful than I prefer and I cannot adjust the stream as my particular shower is only one pressure setting. I like that it is metal and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty Counts

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, good quality and pretty long.
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can turn it on or off. I can go from shower head to shower spray with a switch. I love that it's long enough to bathe my shih tzu and i love that i can put it down and it doesnt spray water until i press the lever on it. so i dont get soaked when i wash my dog anymore. I just love it. It is perfect for my needs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Posa

customer_reviews.title: Improved design.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a leaking sprayer. This is a new design from the same company. I am hoping this one will last longer. It has been improved and is easier to use and has more options. I haven't washed a dog with it yet but am certain that this sprayer is going to be a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Beason

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This was easy and fast to install, is made of sturdy metal instead of plastic, and has terrific water pressure. The only thing I would change is to provide a suction-cupped holder instead of one that has to be screwed in. I cannot drill through the tile in my shower, and many other people have showers made of materials that cannot be drilled. You can buy a suction-cupped hand-shower holder from other sellers on Amazon, but that increases the total cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Camp

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! It makes cleaning our pets as well as cleaning the bathtub so much easier. It was easy to install. It has a control that gives me a light stream for washing my grandchildren’s hair or a strong stream for thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Single Handle Faucet? Skip This Product.
customer_reviews.text: You get all or nothing. If you don’t have a faucet that allows you to adjust the force of the spray, you get the full power coming through. This is NOT useful for washing a dog. To make it work right you have to turn the diverter down which pushes water out the shower as well. I’ll be returning this for something that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Argh!
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer stopped working properly after 6mos of daily use. Unfortunately the sprayer is constantly spraying water no matter what position the lever is. I thought paying a little more for a sprayer would mean better quality- in this case I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolfsburg

customer_reviews.title: Saves the back
customer_reviews.text: We installed it in a spare bathroom and it works great. The real trick to ordering this type of product is to make sure the hose is long enough to reach all areas of the shower so that you can get all sides of your dog easily. This does the trick. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL AND WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is JUST what I needed to wash my 20 pound dog in the bath tub! Easy to install...and almost perfect. The thumb trigger is slippery and could use some sort of rubber non-slip coating. I will figure out something to put on the trigger to keep my thumb from slipping off. So, other than that, it is perfect! I don't want to drill holes in my tile wall for the included hose holder, so I just loop it over the shower head and it stays just fine. So glad I didn't settle for something that I have to take on and off every time I want to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Built Well, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used it on my dog as yet, but my husband installed, no problem. Appears well made, been using it to rinse down my large, tile shower. Works great. Would definitely be perfect for dog baths.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K. Fena

customer_reviews.title: Way too powerful to use on my dog.
customer_reviews.text: While the install was easy and it is easy to actually spray, it is an extremely powerful spray and I am not comfortable using it on my dog. It also is difficult to use for cleaning the shower since it sprays so strong that water ends up outside of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: ModernMoon

customer_reviews.title: Never using toilet paper again
customer_reviews.text: Having experienced a dog shower on my poopoo cleaning endeavor, I am sold and never going back to expensive toilet paper again. Fitting takes 5 minutes. Everything is included with spares. Quality product. Can’t ask for more. When you buy just select the Nom default option of shower head with pressure control so u can get just the amount of pressure you need.
customer_reviews.author: Viatycalcobra

customer_reviews.title: Operates well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for washing off my dogs after the dog park or potty accidents. The connections, knob, and handle haven't leaked. The sprayer has a pretty low flow rate, which means the pressure builds up fast. I have to turn the faucet on very low or else it sprays so hard it scares the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DeJongTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer! I’m glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is installed in (separate) shower of our master bathroom. It has great water pressure and the long hose allows us to use it to clean our adjacent bathtub and we’ve also used it to rinse off our bubble covered children. We haven’t used it on our dog yet, but I don’t anticipate any issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Longoria

product_meta.title: REEGE Dog Shower Sprayer Attachment Set for Pet Bathing and Dog Washing-Bathroom Sprayer Shower Arm Diverter with Hand Shower Head and Hose Sprayer Head Kit
feature_bullets: COMPLETE SET FOR DOG BATHING SYSTEM IN SUMMER OR WINTER (for MIXED WATER)-Comes with handheld dog shower sprayer head, hand shower arm diverter (brass adapter valve), stainless steel hose, holster and so on.Perfect solution for dog washer in winter,can be connected to hot and cold water(mixed water).

MULTIFUNCTION-Not only ideal for portable dog shower in bathroom, but also can be used as hand held bidet for personal hygiene,baby cloth diaper sprayer set etc,COMPLETE BATHING STATION: The Pet Wand Pro PPR-252 dog bathing system includes the Pet Wand PRO, 8-Foot Flexible Hose, Outdoor Hose Adapter, Suction Cup Hook, and Indoor Shower Diverter. for a superior clean at home. Flow Rate is 12L/min

BUILT WITH SOLID MATERIALS-Convenient and frustration free without leaks or sprayer problems-the shower arm diverter is made by top premium brass with disc cartridge for leakproof and durability warranty, 2-way water diverter switches the flow of water from a stationary showerhead to a handheld shower, water flows from only one showerhead at a time; the hand sprayer wand is made by ABS plastic material.

STANDARD AND COMPATIBLE SIZE FOR AMERICA FAMILY-The faucet diverter has 1/2 in. IPS female inlet and 1/2 in. IPS male outlet; Universal for most of USA bath room; Easy to install in a few minutes without plumber help

FLEXIBLE AND DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL HOSE WITH EXTRA LONG SIZE-This dog shower hose for bathroom is made by top stainless steel with chrome plated. Frustration free can last for years, 100% quality guaranteed!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
